abstract_summ: Oral and maxillofacial surgery (OMS) clinical practice uniquely exposes providers to COVID-19 . Almost all residents (96.5%) reported modifications to their training program, and 14% had been reassigned to off-service clinical rotations . The use of an N95 respirator mask plus standard PPE precautions during aerosol-generating procedures varied by procedure location, with 36.8% reporting limited access to these respirators .
